amendment.description: Amendment requires the President to make available via the Internet the name of any nongovernment person who is a passenger on an aircraft designated as Air Force One or Air Force Two not later than 30 days after that person is a passenger.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require the President to post on the Internet the names of all non-governmental persons who are passengers on Air Force One or Air Force Two within 30 days of the flight.

action.text: Amendment (A023) offered by Mr. Salmon to the Shays amendment (A002).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Salmon amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.
